titleproper.value: Guide to the Fales Library Poster Collection <num>MSS.586</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-08-29T20:50:40</date>

abstract.value: This collection was assembled by Special Collections staff from individual posters donated to the libary. Posters in this collection include artwork and promotions for publications, exhibitions, and educational programs, many of which focus on art, music, film, and theater in New York City. Materials date from 1968 to 2010.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Fales Poster Collection; MSS 586; box number; folder number or item identifier; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.
Materials gifted from various donors, 2017-2019. The accession number associated with this gift is 2019.049.

This collection was assembled by Special Collections staff from individual posters donated to the library. Posters in this collection include artwork as well as promotions for publications, exhibitions, and educational programs, many of which focus on art, music, film, and theater in New York City. Materials date from 1968 to 2010.

corpname.value: School of Visual Arts (New York, N.Y.)
